author: oheger
msg: Fixed handling of public and system IDs.
The IDs are now correctly obtained from the source XML document and passed to
the transformer before the target document is written.

author: oheger
msg: Fixed a problem with handling of the xml:space attribute.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked XMLConfiguration to operate on immutable nodes.
The major part of the functionality for loading and saving XML documents is
working, but there is still a bunch of tests failing.

author: oheger
msg: InMemoryNodeModel now supports reference objects that can be assigned to nodes.
This is required for some concrete configuration implementations which needs to
store additional data for their nodes.
